review: I purchased the Chromecast to stream Netfix content to our TV in the bedroom and can report that it works very well.  Occasionally, it will have a minor glitch and staying connected to the WiFi, but that has been very infrequent since I moved a wireless access point closer to the bedroom.  For $35, I don't think you can go wrong with the Chromecast.

review: The chromecast works perfectly for what is advertises. It is extremely convenient that it will automatically switch inputs when casting something (it will not however switch back to what you were watching before casting). Google is clearly trying to expand the app compatibility and in my opinion they are only missing watchESPN and Amazon prime video.Bottom line is I would recommend this to anyone who wants an easy way to play Netflix or Chrome browser mirroring. Extremely satisfied!
